dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
Before you dive in, 
let's setup a few things first

To continue, press Next

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text:
- Added ability to export to any service which supports the Storage Access Framework 
 - Added option to set the location for regular automatic backups (See backup settings)
 - Added Bitcoin currency support
 - Added support for renaming books
 - Multiple bug fixes and improvements

dynGuiComponent.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponent.contentDescription: Now you can mix business and pleasure while keeping them separate ;)

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: GnuCash Android supports working with multiple different Books (ledgers) simultaneously.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: However, only the accounts and transactions of one book displayed at any given time. But you can switch easily between different books.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: In order to switch books do the following:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: Open the navigation drawer (by tapping the Hamburger menu at top left)

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: Open the navigation drawer (by tapping the Hamburger menu at top left)

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: Below the name of the app, you will see the name of the currently active book. Tap on it

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: Below the name of the app, you will see the name of the currently active book. Tap on it

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: The recently used books will be displayed. Select any one to open it

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: The recently used books will be displayed. Select any one to open it

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: If the book you want is not displayed, selece "Manage Books"

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: If the book you want is not displayed, selece "Manage Books"

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: A list of all books currently in the app will be displayed. Select any one to load it

dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: A list of all books currently in the app will be displayed. Select any one to load it
